txt.en: I have hidden this message and parcel for you, I hope that it will find its way into your hands in the event that I do not return. You have my thanks for all you have done, and I would also beseech you for forgiveness.\n\nMy pride cost me my daughter long ago, and I was blinded by grief over her mother's death. Perhaps this may help you understand why I have done all that I have.
